description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pixel Mix is a complex grid based puzzle game. Players must combine color tiles of different colors to create color cubes that will accomplish various tasks. Pixel Mix boasts 4 modes with distinct strategy and game play that contain many levels.
description.short: Pixel Mix is a complex grid based puzzle game. Players must combine color tiles of different colors to create color cubes that will accomplish various tasks. Pixel Mix boasts 4 modes with distinct strategy and game play that contain many levels.
